name: Baldi's basics 1.3.2 android
description:
This is a old fangame that was for android android but i updated it from 1.2.2 to 1.3.2

1.3.2 patch notes:

Added: First prize, scissors, tape recorder

Fixed: Gotta sweep is fast and takes baldi with him now, font moved to right locations

Improved: visual polishing, ai improvements, optimization, difficulty, bsoda sprays correctly

Problems with 1.2.2

Too hard ,unoptimized, gotta sweep only takes player, bsoda doesn't work properly, ai is dumb and glitches outside of school, no first prize, no scissors, font misplaced
